#summary Create or replace an asset.
#labels Protocol-Asset

= Request Format =

|| *Parameter* || *Description* || *Type* || *Required* ||
||`AssetID`||UUID of the asset||UUID||Optional||
||`CreatorID`||UUID of the asset creator||UUID||Yes||
||`Asset`||Raw asset data||Binary||Yes||

{{{
POST /assets/ HTTP/1.1
Content-Length: 42574
Content-Type: multipart/form-data; boundary=--AaB03x

--AaB03x
Content-Disposition: form-data; name="AssetID"

f02ed1f6-c1fd-4781-b38a-f337e880f822
--AaB03x
Content-Disposition: form-data; name="CreatorID"

5a514c21-1278-4f85-b28c-3cda253c98e4
--AaB03x
Content-Disposition: form-data; name="Asset"; filename="portrait.tga"
Content-Type: image/tga

(raw portrait.tga data)
--AaB03x--
}}}

  * If AssetID is specified and the asset already exists, the old asset will be replaced
  * Only one asset upload is allowed per request

= Response Format =

|| *Parameter* || *Description* || *Type* ||
||`Success`||True if an AssetID was returned, False if a Message was returned||Boolean||
||`AssetID`||UUID of the created or updated asset||UUID||
||`Message`||Error message||String||

Success:

{{{
{
    "Success":true,
    "AssetID":"f02ed1f6-c1fd-4781-b38a-f337e880f822"
}
}}}

Failure:

{{{
{
    "Success":false,
    "Message":"Content type not allowed"
}
}}}
